casebody.data:
In re GERMAN PUBLICATION SOC., Inc. In re CROMBIE & LAMOTHE, Inc. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 19, 1923.) No. 228. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. In the matter of the German Publication Society, Inc. Petition to review decision of referee adverse to Crombie & Lamothe, Inc., was dismissed (289 Fed. 509), and petitioner appeals. Affirmed. Shaine & Weinrib, of New York City (Edward C. Weinrib, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Boardman Wright, of New York City, for appellee.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed, with costs.
